name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance backend systems and financial platforms. Proficient in **C#**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), and **SQL**, with expertise in cloud services like **AWS**. Strong knowledge of **Snowflake**, **Angular**, **React**, **Vue.js**, and **PowerBI** to create scalable, efficient applications. Experienced in integrating AI solutions and building automation tools using **Databricks**. Demonstrated history of delivering impactful projects for leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to engineer backend services using **FastAPI**, enhancing document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows for optimal performance.
Employed **Celery** and **Redis** for developing event-driven solutions, effectively managing asynchronous processing for over **5,000** financial transaction requests.
Deployed scalable microservices on **Azure App Services** and implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, ensuring efficient cloud operations and a reduction in deployment time by **30%**.
Designed and upheld data pipelines for regulatory data exchanges with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a timely and accurate data flow with processing times reduced to under **2 hours**.
Conducted thorough security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to establish secure and scalable authentication systems, servicing over **10,000** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges, ensuring compliance with industry standards while managing release strategies across **3** core platforms.

• Developed robust backend systems utilizing **Python** and **FastAPI** to enhance user onboarding, automate document workflows, and manage comprehensive reporting processes.
• Engineered event-driven microservices featuring **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing for over **10,000** financial transactions daily.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to create services that scale efficiently and consistently across multiple environments.
• Designed and implemented data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange, harnessing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for a data flow upgrade that improved processing speed by **30%**.
• Conducted thorough security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, while integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for effective authentication and secure access control mechanisms.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to guarantee seamless system integration, maintain regulatory compliance, and achieve successful release management on projects with deadlines of up to **3 months**.

• Developed backend services for Order Management Systems (OMS) and Execution Management Systems (EMS) using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, achieving a data update frequency of **0.1 seconds**.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams utilizing **Angular**, **React**, and **Vue.js** to deliver data through REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform and improving load times by **30%**.
• Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, resulting in a **50%** reduction in bugs during production.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, reducing task completion times by **25%**.
• Developed data analytics dashboards utilizing **PowerBI** and integrated with cloud data warehouses such as **Snowflake**, providing real-time business insights.
